attributes.action: People from Abroad Must Sign a Contract for Citizenship which Lasts 10 Years.
attributes.additional_details: Due to the Press, TV Highlighting Crimes like Drugs Gangs, Thieving, Shop Theft, something needs to to Protect the Innocent from these criminals, Everyone needs to look for a Job to pay their way in life, just this will take effect to Protect Shop Keepers and Public alike.
attributes.background: Far too many coming in and not abiding by our Laws and getting into Crime, if they had a Contract for at Least 10 years and they break it then their Citizenship Contract would be broken and Returned to their Country of Origin, should reduce Crime in our Country, far too many Gangs being set up.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action: 

Deport all foreign criminals with effect immediately.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/705093
